column1: '''Konami Corporation''' is a well-known Japanese company with has made famous video game series like [[Wikipedia:Castlevania
column4: Metal Gear Solid]]. They were the company that developed [[Riders of Rohan (video game)
column5: Riders of Rohan]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/riders.html Riders of Rohan] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 4 January 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=6 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 7 (retrieved 4 January 2011)</ref>
